title: Didn't receive my Epic Skin missions?
body: I purchased 7 rune pages with RP before the preseason update but I didn't receive any skins or skin missions once the update landed. Did I do something incorrectly?

replies.body: Try clicking on the "Claim Your Rewards" button on the client Home Page to get that little popup to happen again. I'm hoping that will sync everything back up and get those missions added onto your account for you. If that doesn't work though, please reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can start looking into what could have happened.
Hi, I have close to the same problem, I completed the quest but the 2 epic mystery skins did not go into my loot?
i didnt get no skins either i bought the 7 rune page bundle before the update i bought it on the 21st of last month but got nothing help pls
If I remember correctly those skins were automatically added to your profile, and you should be able to see them under your collection and recently purchased items.
